channel.title: Need help with adding a default bank
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im brand new here and i registered because i need some help with my private server. I have a PK server. I want people to be able to log on and automatically have certain items in their bank. I know this is probably very easy, but im a noob. :). I hope someone can help me with this.
P.S. Its PI BASE Thanks in advance.
